child.pub-comments: Geography, continued: Maikop is the capital. Also spoken in Australia, Egypt, France, Germany, Iraq, Israel (Kafr Kama and Rehaniya, small border villages.), Jordan, Macedonia (A few villages in Macedonia), Netherlands, Syria, Turkey (villages in Kayseri, Tokat, Karaman Maras, and many other provinces in central and western Anatolia), USA.

child.pub-comments: Geography, continued: The capital is Syelzha Ghaala (Chechen name) or Grozny (Groznii; Russian name). Also spoken in Georgia, Germany, Jordan (in 2 or 3 villages mixed among Adygey and Arabic speakers), Kazakhstan, Kyrgyzstan, Syria, Turkey (Asia), Uzbekistan.Chechen is at least partially intelligible with Ingush, more so with contact.
child.geography: Russia. Chechnya, north Caucasus. (See comments for more information.)
